revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A System of Familiar Philosophy: in twelve lectures, being the course usually read by Mr. A. Walker... (Adam Walker). (London : Printed for the author, at his house,..."
revision.text: Possibly: A System of Familiar Philosophy: in twelve lectures, being the course usually read by Mr. A. Walker... (Adam Walker). (London : Printed for the author, at his house, no. 42, Conduit-Street, Hanover-Square; G. Kearsley, Fleet-Street; and Bell and Bradfute, Edinburgh, 1799). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2513697~S1
